# Haida Gwaii {#hg}

Here is the information available for steelhead CUs in the Haida Gwaii region. Steelhead CUs in this region were defined in [Parkinson et al. 2005](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/library/lib_521/).

![Map of the Haida Gwaii region of the Pacific Salmon Explorer](_bookdown_files/map_hg_region.png)


## *Haida Gwaii Winter*

cu_list <- read.csv("_bookdown_files/steelhead_cu_population_lookup_2022.csv")
